11:00 <Slashman> has quit  
11:02 <cjd> Question about AWM: If I have an application and I click "create an item", I understand it creates an XWikiDocument transparently for holding the "item", how does it select the name for that document?  
11:03 <tmortagne> cjd: it's asking you the name of the item before creating it  
11:04 <tmortagne> (and use it for the document name)  
11:04 <cjd> ok thanks  
11:04 <vmassol> there are plan to autogenerate the page name too  
11:04 <vmassol> (there's an extension module for that also and we'd like to bring it into the platform at some point)  
11:04 <cjd> MyAWMApplication\_343613478954612 ?  
11:04 <cjd> like that?
